reviews.review: 1000 hours in CS:GO but 20 years of playing CS. If it wasn't about shooting people efficiently in the face it would be in the Olympics, 10/10.

After playing this game for so long and writing a g8 review on my second account prior to this. I wanted to recollect myself and say this game is still horrible and i would never touch this shit ever again if my life depending on it. So so so bad garbage, i smell the stench from this game as i start is up and my computer gets sick playing this garbage trash garbage. So bad bad bad. Feels good to say it, this is so so trash.
I love this game it's great to come back to whenever you get tilted from League :D
Trash developers, anti-consumer skins, hackers everywhere. Play at your own risk
Recomendo, eu jogo desde a época do Counter-Strike 1.5.

With 822 hours played... no i dont recommend. The life i have spent in this game has been wasted. There once was a time were I was pretty high rank, and then the derank apocalypse happened and now I have been stuck at silver one thanks to hackers, and the fact that i don't play religiously anymore or buy skins, etc... but if you want to wants an hour or two sure play it, go nuts.
